name: Count Bacterial Colonies
description: Count bacterial colonies from an image of agar plate using computer vision techniques
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/count_bacterial_colonies.py

fields.name: image_path
fields.description: Path to the image file containing bacterial colonies on agar plate

fields.name: dilution_factor
fields.description: Dilution factor of the plated sample

fields.name: plate_area_cm2
fields.description: Area of the agar plate in square centimeters

fields.name: output_dir
fields.description: Directory to save output images and results
